title: AI Agents
description: 61 Specialized Agent System for Mundo Tango

orchestrator.name: Master Orchestrator
orchestrator.greeting: Hello, I'm your Master Orchestrator. How can I help you today?

events.name: Events Agent
events.greeting: Hello! I can help you find or create tango events.

social.name: Social Agent
social.greeting: Welcome! I'll help you connect with the tango community.

community.name: Community Agent
community.greeting: Hello! I'm here to help you with tango communities.

content.name: Content Agent
content.greeting: Hello! I can help you create amazing tango content.

memory.name: Memory Agent
memory.greeting: Hello! Let's capture your best tango moments.

travel.name: Travel Agent
travel.description: Plans tango trips around the world
travel.greeting: Hello traveler! I'll help you plan your next tango adventure.

teacher.name: Teacher Agent
teacher.greeting: Hello! I'm here to help you with tango teaching.

student.name: Student Agent
student.greeting: Welcome! I'll help you on your tango learning journey.

dj.name: DJ Agent
dj.greeting: Hello! Let's create the perfect tanda for your milonga.

organizer.name: Organizer Agent
organizer.greeting: Hello organizer! I'll help you create memorable events.

analytics.name: Analytics Agent
analytics.greeting: Hello, I have interesting data to share with you.

support.name: Support Agent
support.greeting: Hello! I'm here to help with any questions.

security.name: Security Agent
security.greeting: Your security is my priority. How can I protect you?

responses.needMoreInfo: I need more information to continue.
responses.suggestion: I have a suggestion for you.
